remarks: The ideal generated by a subset of a ring.  (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 10-Jun-2010.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 20-Dec-2013.)
statement:
igenval.1 $e |- G = ( 1st ` R ) $.
igenval.2 $e |- X = ran G $.
igenval $p |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ S C_ X ) -> ( R IdlGen S ) = |^| { j e. ( Idl ` R ) | S C_ j } ) $.
$d R j $.
$d S j $.
$d X j $.
